gcc -fPIC -shared -Wl,-soname,librun_ffmpeg.so.0.0.1 -o librun_ffmpeg.so.0.0.1 CMakeFiles/run_ffmpeg.dir/base64.c.o CMakeFiles/run_ffmpeg.dir/cmd_util.c.o CMakeFiles/run_ffmpeg.dir/common.c.o CMakeFiles/run_ffmpeg.dir/filter.c.o CMakeFiles/run_ffmpeg.dir/hw.c.o CMakeFiles/run_ffmpeg.dir/open_files.c.o CMakeFiles/run_ffmpeg.dir/run_ffmpeg.c.o CMakeFiles/run_ffmpeg.dir/transcode.c.o   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib: -lavformat -lavdevice -lavcodec -lavutil -lavfilter -lswscale -lswresample -lm
